body: Please Sequel
I’d have children for genghis khan, Attila or ragnar too even if they are ugly. Strong boi >weak boi

Honestly, if they do make a sequel, I'd like for the kid to end up becoming as much of a bloodthirsty warrior as this guy, not some 'good guy'. It'd be kinda cool to see him go from idealistic and all that to being a burly tough motherfucker who slays demons in battle like it's nobody's deal, and who is prideful over being the greatest hero of all.
interesting, needs sequel
Needs sequel
surprisingly a realistic situation from its time & culture, especially for a hentai story LOL

I would say that nothing is wrong with it. Ancient times teached us that strongs get flock by girls. Girls give no shit if you're cute or handsome, if you can't protect yourself or those around you're nothing. Modern times gave us safe environment where weak guys now become a choice, but instincts still there that girls choose the strong. Girls ain't goddesses as you thought they'd be. They're still capable of human folly and willing to bear the children of the strong, ugly or not.
If we back to 1000 years ago. I would be glad to be impregnated by "ugly bastard" if he is strong and the hero of the tribe, like in this comic. Good looking guy is useless at that era
Again, ruined by the ugly bastard, ugh. Why, Japan?
This need a sequel
3 month later.... Still waiting the boy take the girls aways from the old hero and NTR-ed the hero girls. Will the boy be the new hero?

NTR tag ? no NTR there, its just the tribe custom. quite vanilla if i would say, i wonder in dangerous village like that, they still have a young innocent looking boy and a peace calm grandma
where the monsters attack?
It don't need NTR tag. That old guy already trow him self to the closest place to graveyard since very young age.

Oh come on! Starts all cool brutal and barbaric and showes cool looking ripped guys, but the actual sex scenes are with ugly old fucker.

And that brother part is out of place too. You'd think someone from the tribe would know how it works and agree with that.

I laughed when the brother vowed to become strong in order to save his sister. I mean what a joke the guy is talking about saving his sister but she never needed saving all that we have seen shows she had no issue with being chosen and doesn't seem to mind her life as a hero breeder. In fact she considers it a honor.  Even if the brother was some how able to rise above his beta male status and become a beast of an alpha and take her back I don't think she's thank him for it. I wonder if this is suppose to be subliminally mocking the more annoying vanilla fans who instantly think any heroine in a non-pure vanilla setting needs rescuing because their little minds can't grasp that there is a gray area between vanilla and the dark side that rape, ntr and other hardcore things hardline vanilla fans hate call home.
